description:
“The tools of conquest do not necessarily come with bombs and explosions & fallout.
There are weapons which are simply thoughts, attitudes, prejudices- to be found only in the minds of men. 

For the record, prejudices can kill, and suspicion can destroy, and a thoughtless frightened search for a scapegoat has a fallout all its own- for the children and the children yet unborn. And the pity of it is that these things cannot be confined to The Twilight Zone.”

[closing narration: “The Monsters Are Due on Maple Street”, Twilight Zone episode that aired March 4th, 1960.
